attributes.action: we need a general election and re-instate local elections
attributes.additional_details: we need a change of government due to all the u turns the current government has made
attributes.background: re instate local elections in May 2026. Or call a general election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Stop the cancellation of Local Elections to help uphold democracy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751384

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
